<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.5.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.system_update_set" name="System Update Sets (with remote update set support)" state="published" help="System_Update_Sets_(remote_update_set_support)_Plugin" version="1.5.0" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.apps_hub"/> <import plugin="com.glide.system_update_set_picker"/> <import plugin="com.glide.system_update_set_preview"/> </requires> <description>Update sets facilitate moving customizations between systems</description>
<extension point="com.glide.db.listener" name="UpdateSetMonitor" class="com.glide.system_update_set.UpdateSetLogger" /> <extension point="com.glide.db.ddlchange.listener" name="UpdateSetMonitorTableChange" class="com.glide.system_update_set.UpdateSetLogger" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UpdateSetOriginCleaner" class="com.glide.update.UpdateSetOriginCleaner"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UpdateXmlScopeValidatorWrapper" class="com.glide.update.scope.validation.updatexml.scriptable.UpdateXmlScopeValidatorWrapper"/>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Update sets facilitate moving customizations between systems</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=System_Update_Sets_(remote_update_set_support)_Plugin</help> <id>com.glide.system_update_set</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>System Update Sets (with remote update set support)</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.system_update_set/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.apps_hub,com.glide.system_update_set_picker,com.glide.system_update_set_preview</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.system_update_set</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.5.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: System Update Sets (with remote update set support)
